Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons or a ranged weapon.
Weapon Bonus: If using a melee weapon% attack and damage bonus is based on Strength. If using a ranged weapon% attack and damage bonus is based on Dexterity
Description: You study the enemy% looking for a gap in his defenses. Only when you find it do you strike.

Effects: If you move in the same turn after this attack% leaving the first square adjacent to the target does not provoke an opportunity attack from the target.
Description: Let the fighter stand toe to toe with the monster. You prefer to make your attack% then withdraw to safer ground.

Special Effects: Shift 1 square before or after you attack
Description: You slink past your enemy’s guard to make your attack% or you make your attack and then withdraw to a more advantageous position.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons or a ranged weapon.
Description: If the first attack doesn’t kill it% the second one might.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Primary Target: Each enemy in burst you can see
Description: Enemies surround you—much to their chagrin% as you slash them to pieces with the ferocity of a wounded dire wolverine.

Weapon Bonus: If using a melee weapon% attack and damage bonus is based on Strength. If using a ranged weapon% attack and damage bonus is based on Dexterity
Special Effects: You can shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier either before or after the attack.
Description: You confound enemies by weaving through the battlefield unscathed as you make your attacks.

Trigger: An enemy makes a melee attack against you
Effects: You can shift 1 square% then make a basic attack against the enemy.
Special Effects: Gain a power bonus to your basic attack roll equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Description: Using the momentum from your enemy’s blow to fall back or slip to one side% you make a sudden retaliatory attack as he stumbles to regain his composure.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons or a ranged weapon.
Weapon Bonus: If using a melee weapon% attack and damage bonus is based on Strength. If using a ranged weapon% attack and damage bonus is based on Dexterity
Hit Effects: If both attacks hit% you deal extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Description: You sink two arrows or both of your blades into the flesh of your enemy% causing it to howl in pain.

Weapon Bonus: If using a melee weapon% attack and damage bonus is based on Strength. If using a ranged weapon% attack and damage bonus is based on Dexterity
Hit Effects: The target is slowed and takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends both).
Miss Effects: Half damage% no ongoing damage% and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Description: A well-placed shot to the leg leaves your enemy hobbled and bleeding.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Description: You use your weapons to hedge in your foe and trick him into exposing a weak spot% at which point you strike.

Primary Target: Two creatures within 3 squares of each other
Effects: Make two attack rolls% take the higher result% and apply it to both targets.
Description: You fire two arrows at once% which separate in mid-flight to strike two different targets.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Secondary Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (main weapon)% and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.
Effects: You shift 1 square and make a secondary attack against the target.
Special Effects: The first attack is made with your off-hand weapon% while the second attack is made with you main weapon.
Description: You hold your weapons blade-down and slash your foe across the face with one of them. As he spins away and drops his guard% you roll to one side% spring to your feet% and plunge your other blade into his back.

Trigger: An ally within range that you can see or hear makes a skillType check using a skillType in which you’re trained
Effects: Grant the ally the ability to reroll the skillType check% with a power bonus equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Description: You are wise in all things. The sooner your friends realize this% the safer and better off they’ ll be.

Trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack
Effects: Slide the enemy into a square adjacent to you and gain combat advantage against it until the end of your next turn.
Description: You deftly block your enemy’s strike and turn his momentum against him% causing him to stumble to the side.

Trigger: An enemy damages you with a melee attack
Effects: You can shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier. Gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
Description: Even as your foe connects% you leap backward% out of the way of further harm.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons or a ranged weapon.
Weapon Bonus: If using a melee weapon% attack and damage bonus is based on Strength. If using a ranged weapon% attack and damage bonus is based on Dexterity
Special Effects: After the first or the second attack% you can shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier.
Description: You attack twice while maneuvering yourself into the most advantageous position possible.

Trigger: You or an ally is attacked by a creature
Weapon Bonus: If using a melee weapon% attack and damage bonus is based on Strength. If using a ranged weapon% attack and damage bonus is based on Dexterity
Hit Effects: The target takes a penalty to its attack roll for the triggering attack equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Description: You thwart an enemy’s attack with a timely thrust of your blade or a quick shot from your bow.

Weapon Bonus: If using a melee weapon% attack and damage bonus is based on Strength. If using a ranged weapon% attack and damage bonus is based on Dexterity
Primary Target: One creature that is your quarry
Description: You strike quickly% like a shadow wasp flying out of the darkness% hitting where your foe is most vulnerable.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons or a ranged weapon.
Weapon Bonus: If using a melee weapon% attack and damage bonus is based on Strength. If using a ranged weapon% attack and damage bonus is based on Dexterity
Hit Effects: With each hit% you push the target 1 square. If both attacks hit the same target% you push the target a number of squares equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier.
Description: You attack twice% causing your foes to stagger backward.

Miss Effects: Half damage% and the target is not weakened.
Description: One well-placed arrow leaves your enemy hunched over and howling in pain.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Hit Effects: If an attack hits% the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. If both attacks hit the same target% it is dazed and slowed until the end of your next turn.
Special Effects: Before or after these attacks% you can move your speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
Description: You leap into the fray and unleash a torrent of steel upon your unsuspecting foes% staggering them with the ferocity of your attacks.

Hit Effects: The target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of the encounter.
Miss Effects: Half damage% and the target takes a –1 penalty to attack rolls until the end of the encounter.
Description: Your arrow burrows into flesh and shatters% sending splinters of wood deep into the wound.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Secondary Target: One creature other than the primary target
Hit Effects: Roll 2[W] for your main weapon and 1[W] for your off-hand weapon when calculating damage
Effects: After attacking the primary target% you can shift 2 squares and make a secondary attack.
Special Effects: You can shift 2 squares before making this attack.
Description: You set upon a foe with weapons bared% then weave to the side and deal a wound to another adversary.

Effects: At the start of a surprise round in which any allies are surprised% use this power to allow a number of allies equal to your Wisdom modifier to avoid being surprised.
Description: You are the eyes and ears of the group% always alert for the telltale signs of an ambush.

Effects: Any ally within 10 squares of you who attempts an untrained check with a skillType in which you are trained gains a power bonus to checks with a single skillType of your choice equal to your Wisdom modifier. The ally must be able to see or hear you to gain this bonus. The benefit lasts until the end of the encounter or for 5 minutes.
Description: Your allies benefit from the things that you have learned.

Trigger: An enemy moves adjacent to you
Effects: You can shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Description: You dodge through the thick of the fight% denying your foes a chance to pin you down in one spot.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Hit Effects: Roll 2[W] for your main weapon and 1[W] for your off-hand weapon when calculating damage
Description: Your steel blades flash menacingly as you taunt your foes with parries and cut deep wounds into their flesh.

Weapon Bonus: If using a melee weapon% attack and damage bonus is based on Strength. If using a ranged weapon% attack and damage bonus is based on Dexterity
Effects: Gain a power bonus to this attack equal to your Wisdom modifier. Ignore any penalties from cover or concealment (but not superior cover or total concealment).
Description: Like the hawk% you strike with calculated precision.

Requirement: You must be wielding a ranged weapon.
Hit Effects: Roll 2[W] for your the first shot and 1[W] for the second shot when calculating damage
Description: You unleash two arrows in rapid succession.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Hit Effects: You push the target a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier and it is knocked prone.
Description: You slash and stab at surrounding foes with unbound fury% knocking them off balance with thrusts and leg sweeps.

Weapon Bonus: If using a melee weapon% attack and damage bonus is based on Strength. If using a ranged weapon% attack and damage bonus is based on Dexterity
Effects: You can move your speed. At any point during your move% you can make two Strength vs. AC attacks with a melee weapon or two Dexterity vs. AC attacks with a ranged weapon.
Description: Without breaking stride% you make two attacks against a single foe or two different targets.

Effects: This attack does not provoke opportunity attacks.
Description: Though menaced by fangs and claws% you calmly unload an arrow into the creature’s gaping maw mere inches from your outstretched arm.

Requirement: You must be wielding a ranged weapon.
Primary Target: Each enemy in blast you can see
Description: You fire repeatedly with a short draw% showering arrows at each enemy in front of you.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Primary Target: Each enemy in burst you can see
Description: You spin around with blades outstretched% using momentum and skillType to slice through enemy defenses.

Effects: Until the end of your next turn% your speed increases by 4% and when you shift% you can shift 1 additional square.
Description: Like a gazelle% you startle allies and enemies alike with your sudden swiftness.

Trigger: An enemy moves adjacent to you
Effects: You can shift 1 square and then move a number of squares equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier. You can’t end your move adjacent to the triggering enemy.
Description: You keep your distance from an approaching adversary% backpedaling easily away from him.

Effects: Your movement is not hindered by difficult terrain.
Description: You expertly navigate through difficult terrain.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Hit Effects: If one attack hits% the target takes a penalty to AC equal to your Wisdom modifier until the end of your next turn. If both attacks hit% the target takes a penalty to AC equal to 2 + your Wisdom modifier until the end of your next turn.
Description: You attack the weak spots in your opponent’s armor% not only dealing damage but also leaving your prey vulnerable to later attacks.

Primary Target: One creature of your sizeType or smaller
Description: One shot topples your foe.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Hit Effects: If you hit with either attack% you gain a power bonus to AC equal to 2 + your Wisdom modifier until the end of your next turn.
Description: Between strikes% you use both of your weapons to deflect incoming blows.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons or a ranged weapon.
Weapon Bonus: If using a melee weapon% attack and damage bonus is based on Strength. If using a ranged weapon% attack and damage bonus is based on Dexterity
Hit Effects: The target is immobilized until the start of your next turn.
Description: With a well-aimed attack% you pin your foe to the ground or to a nearby wall.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Effects: Alternate main and off-hand weapon attacks until you miss. As soon as an attack misses% this attack ends.
Description: Time seems to slow down as your weapons fall upon your hapless foes like rain from an ominous sky.

Hit Effects: A target hit once takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends). A target hit twice takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends). A target hit three times takes ongoing 15 damage (save ends).
Miss Effects: Half damage per attack% and no ongoing damage.
Description: Your arrows puncture flesh% and from these wounds blood flows in crimson streams.

Hit Effects: A target hit once is dazed (save ends). A target hit twice is stunned (save ends). A target hit three times is stunned (save ends) and takes +2[W] damage.
Description: Your targets won’t know what hit them.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Hit Effects: If one attack hits% the target is stunned (save ends). If both attacks hit% the target is stunned and immobilized (save ends both).
Miss Effects: Half damage per attack% and the target is not stunned or immobilized.
Description: You fight past your enemies’ shields and armor and deal nasty cuts that leave them reeling and unable to react.

Trigger: An enemy hits you with a melee attack
Effects: Shift 1 square away from the enemy.
Description: When your enemy launches his attack% you leap out of the way% leaving your foe to hit nothing but air.
You have an uncanny knack for being in the right place at the right time.

Effects: Shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier and make a saving throw. You are no longer marked by any enemy.
Description: Amid the chaos of combat% you’re able to calm yourself for an instant and recover from a harmful effect.

Trigger: A creature within range attacks your ally
Special Effects: You gain a power bonus to your attack roll equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Description: You point your bow at the villain who just wounded your friend and loose a vengeful arrow.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Primary Target: Each enemy in burst you can see
Hit Effects: The target is immobilized and knocked prone until the end of your next turn.
Description: You whirl around with blades outstretched% slashing your foes across the legs and causing them to fall to the ground in mewling heaps.
You launch a volley of three arrows% which streak across the battlefield with whispered threats of oblivion.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Hit Effects: If both attacks hit% the target takes an extra 1d10 damage and is weakened until the end of your next turn.
Description: You swing your blades in lethal arcs% dousing the battlefield in your enemy’s blood.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Hit Effects: When calculating damage: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage for the first attack (main)% 2[W] + Strength modifier damage for the second attack (off-hand)% and 1[W] + Strength modifier damage for the third attack (main). A target hit once is dazed until the end of your next turn. A target hit twice is stunned until the end of your next turn. A target hit three times is weakened and stunned until the end of your next turn.
Miss Effects: Half damage per attack% and the target is not dazed% stunned% or weakened.
Effects: Make three attacks. After the first attack and after the second attack% you can shift 1 square.
Description: You move swiftly around your enemies% weaving back and forth and delivering a vicious slash with each soft step.

Hit Effects: You push the target a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier% and it is knocked prone.
Miss Effects: Half damage% and you push the target 1 square and it is knocked prone.
Description: You loose an arrow that pierces your foe% hurls him back% and knocks him off his feet.

Special Effects: If the first attack hits% you gain a +5 bonus to the attack roll for the second attack. If the first attack misses% make the second attack normally.
Description: The first shot is always the toughest.

Primary Target: Each enemy in burst you can see
Hit Effects: If you hit a target with one weapon% it takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends). If you hit a target with both weapons% it takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
Miss Effects: Half damage per attack% and no ongoing damage.
Description: Crimson droplets splatter as you slash into all nearby foes.

Effects: When it is not your turn% enemies treat you as invisible if you have cover or concealment from them. An enemy still knows the square you occupy if it saw you in that square at any point during a round. This effect lasts until the end of the encounter or for 5 minutes.
Description: You vanish into your surroundings with such speed and skillType that your enemies can’t even begin to guess where you might be.

Trigger: You are hit by an area attack or a close attack
Effects: Shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Description: You throw yourself to the ground% tumble a safe distance% and spring to your feet no worse for wear.

Effects: You gain a bonus to damage rolls equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Description: You take careful aim with every shot.

Effects: Shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Description: You deftly maneuver around your foes as the battle rages on.

Trigger: A creature makes a melee attack against you
Effects: Until the end of your next turn% the target’s attack rolls against you take a penalty equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Description: Your enemy strikes% and as you defend yourself with one blade% you drive the other deep into his gullet.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Hit Effects: If one attack hits% the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn. If both attacks hit the same target% this penalty worsens to –4.
Effects: Make two attacks. If any adjacent creature makes an attack against you and misses before the start of your next turn% make a melee basic attack against it with both your main weapon and your off-hand weapon as an immediate reaction.
Description: You stab and slash enemies that come close to you.

Hit Effects: You push the target a number of squares equal to 2 + your Wisdom modifier.
Description: You test the strength of your bowstring as you pull an arrow back as far as it will go and unleash it upon your unsuspecting foe.

Hit Effects: If two attacks hit% deal an extra 1[W] damage. If all three attacks hit% deal an extra 2[W] damage.
Description: You pepper your foe with arrows.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons or a ranged weapon.
Weapon Bonus: If using a melee weapon% attack and damage bonus is based on Strength. If using a ranged weapon% attack and damage bonus is based on Dexterity
Effects: Make two attacks. After making these attacks% you can shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Description: With bow or blades% you rain a series of deadly blows on your opponent.

Effects: You can make a basic attack against an enemy you choose as an immediate interrupt if it attacks you.
Description: You counter your opponent’s attack with a ferocious strike of your own.

Requirement: You must be wielding a ranged weapon.
Description: You loose a volley of arrows with such force that they skewer several nearby enemies.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Hit Effects: If both attacks hit% the target takes an extra 1d10 damage and is stunned until the end of your next turn.
Description: You plunge your blades into your opponent and rip them out with the ferocity of a tiger% leaving your prey gasping for life.
You launch a barrage of arrows that strike all enemies before you.

Trigger: One creature you can see has just taken damage
Hit Effects: Do one more weapon die of damage if the target is bloodied.
Description: As an enemy reels from a terrible wound% you quickly loose an arrow to finish him off.

Primary Target: Each enemy in burst you can see
Effects: You can shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier% and make another close burst 1 attack (as above).
Description: You strike your enemies in all directions. Then% like a tornado% you weave through the battlefield and unleash a second onslaught of whirling steel.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Effects: You can use your off-hand weapon to make a melee basic attack with a –2 penalty against each enemy you hit using a melee attack power.
Description: You follow every strike with a backhanded swipe that breaks through your enemy’s defenses.

Effects: Make two attacks. If the first attack hits% you gain a +5 bonus to the second and third attack rolls. If the first attack misses% roll the second and third attacks normally.
Description: If you can hit with the first arrow% the others will follow.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Trigger: An enemy hits you with a melee attack
Hit Effects: Do 3[W] + Strength modifier damage (main) and 1[W] + Strength modifier damage (off-hand). If both attacks hit% the target’s attack misses.
Miss Effects: Half damage with your main weapon% and no damage with your off-hand weapon.
Description: Crossing your blades% you form a defense as solid as a mighty shield% ready to riposte if your enemy isn’t lucky.

Trigger: An ally makes a ranged attack or an area attack
Primary Target: One creature attacked by your ally
Description: You combine fire with one of your allies to take down a troublesome foe.

Trigger: One of your ranged attacks drops an enemy to 0 hit points or fewer
Effects: You gain an action point that you must spend before the end of your next turn.
Description: One enemy falls% and those that remain are about to learn what heroism is all about.

Primary Target: Each enemy designated as your quarry
Miss Effects: The target is knocked prone as it dodges your attack.
Description: You have multiple quarries in your sights% so you unleash a deadly volley of shots at each of them.

Primary Target: One creature designated as your quarry
Special Effects: Ignore penalties for cover (but not superior cover)% concealment% and total concealment. You can attack an invisible target as if it wasn’t invisible.
Description: Your shot is undeterred by obstructions and magical veils.

Effects: Make a Stealth check and use that as your initiative check result. If you get the first turn in the encounter% you can shift up to your speed as a free action before taking any other actions.
Description: Even as your allies take stock of the enemies pouring in around them% you move into position and set your plans into motion.

Effects: The target is designated as your quarry until the end of the encounter% and you can designate one additional creature as a quarry following the normal Hunter’s Quarry rules.
Description: “This foe is my prey!”

Trigger: An adjacent enemy shifts or moves
Hit Effects: The target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Description: Your enemy steps unwittingly into your trap% and you catch him by surprise with a sudden% paralyzing thrust.

Trigger: An ally spends an action point to take an extra action
Effects: You gain an action point that you must spend before the end of your next turn.
Description: You find it within yourself to capitalize on your comrade’s latest act of daring.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Secondary Target: One creature other than the primary target
Effects: Make two attacks. Each enemy hit is marked until the end of the encounter.
Special Effects: You can spend a healing surge before attacking.
Description: You fortify yourself% raise your weapons% and carve scarring wounds into the flesh of your enemies.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Primary Target: Each enemy in burst you can see
Description: You sweep your blades in mighty arcs around you% cutting foes that get too close and thrusting them back.

Effects: You take a –2 penalty to all defenses and gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls.
Description: Aw% what the hell. You only live once.

Requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Primary Target: Each enemy in burst you can see
Effects: Make two attacks per target. You regain your second wind if you have already used it during this encounter.
Special Effects: Before you attack% shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Description: You rush into the midst of your enemies and% like a freezing wind% flay them alive.
